articles.title: Rohit Sharma Or Virat Kohli? Shaheen Afridi Reveals Which Batter's Wicket He Enjoyed Most - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India vs Pakistan, Asia Cup 2023: Shaheen Afridi was the pick of the Pakistan bowlers with four wickets.
articles.content: It was an impressive display from Shaheen Afridi as the fast bowler took four wickets for the Pakistan cricket team during the Asia Cup 2023 match against India on Saturday. The left-arm pacer was in… [+1641 chars]

articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: India vs Pakistan match called off due to rain, here's updated points table of all teams | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Following the call-off, Pakistan now has 3 points, while India has 1 in Group A. However, Nepal -- which lost to Pakistan in the series opener by 238 runs has zero points.
articles.content: With umpires officially calling off the high-intensity match between India and Pakistan due to rains, held at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy in the Asia Cup 2023 on 2 September, bot… [+1600 chars]
